title: PyData: Data Analysis in Python with  Pandas
summary:
Coming from the 2012 PyData Workshop, Wes McKinney, CTO and cofounder of
Lambda Foundry, gives us a tour of Pandas, a rich data manipulation tool built
on top of NumPy. Frustrated with working in R, Wes started building Pandas in
2008 with a focus on fast, intuitive data structures and data manipulation
capabilities. The Pandas project has seen huge growth in the last few years,
and aims to be the ultimate data tool for Python.
